description.displayText:
Norma is the best. I almost didn't write this review because I don't want someone to steal her from us.

 Its incredibly tough to find someone who you can trust with your infant and lucky for us, we found Norma. From the beginning, Norma has been incredibly reliable, punctual, and wonderful with our daughter, who sometimes can be a handful. She does many activities with her, which we greatly appreciate and we can see it's positively impacted her development. We have nothing but great things to say about Norma and would highly recommend her for any of your babysitting needs!

description.displayText: We are glad to have found Norma to care for our toddler. Norma is experienced, punctual, dependable, calm and gentle.  She pays attention to details and have good methods to guide children to positive behavior. She makes me feel everything is under control and I appreciate that ease of mind.
description.originalText: We are glad to have found Norma to care for our toddler. Norma is experienced, punctual, dependable, calm and gentle.  She pays attention to details and have good methods to guide children to positive behavior. She makes me feel everything is under control and I appreciate that ease of mind.

description.displayText:
Norma is wonderful!  We really love her.
From the moment she started working she gave me such comfort and ease. I was really impressed with her ability to have children instantly warm to her and most important her genuine love for them. Norma is an excellent nanny because she is honest and trustworthy. She is always on-time and will do everything exactly how she is asked. Our son is the most important person to us and she cared for him as if he were the most important person to her.  When Norma was with my son I never had to worry and that means the world.

description.displayText: Norma is kind and patient and took to our baby son very quickly. She is the type of person who is able to swoop right in and adapt to your family's needs in terms of care giving to make sure the parents feel at ease. And if there is anything you would like her to do differently, she's quick to make changes and asks for continuous feedback. We've only been working with Norma for about a month, but I can say without doubt that she is very trustworthy... and her punctuality is unparalleled!

description.displayText: Norma is fantastic! We have only been using her a short time but my 2 1/2 year old took to her immediately. She is so helpful around the house and is wonderful with my son. Highly recommend her!
